FuncDef: This command enables the propagation in the local PBB of any regular LDP MAC Flush received in the related B-VPLS. If an LDP MAC flush-all-but-mine is received in the B-VPLS context, the command controls also whether a flush is performed for all the customer MACs in the associated FDB. The command does not have any effect on a PBB MAC Flush (LDP MAC flush with PBB TLV) received in the related B-VPLS context.Thenoform of this command disables the propagation of LDP MAC Flush i from the related B-VPLS.
